articles.description: Watch, listen and follow updates as England face Spain in the 2023 Women's World Cup final in Sydney.
articles.title: Fifa Women's World Cup final: Build-up to Spain v England

articles.description: England's wait to win a first Women's World Cup title goes on following defeat by Spain in the final on a heartbreaking evening in Sydney.
articles.title: England beaten by Spain in Women's World Cup final

articles.description: Watch the moment Spain make history after beating England 1-0 in a thrilling Women's World Cup final in Sydney.
articles.title: Watch the moment Spain win their first Women's World Cup

articles.description: Follow live text and radio commentary as Aston Villa face Everton in the Premier League.
articles.title: Premier League: Aston Villa v Everton - team news & build-up

articles.description: Olga Carmona fires home to give Spain the lead over England in the first half of the Women's World Cup final in Sydney.
articles.title: Carmona's strike puts Spain ahead in final

articles.description: Watch Great Britain's Katarina Johnson-Thompson move into heptathlon lead with one event to go after impressive displays in the long jump and javelin.
articles.title: Johnson-Thompson moves into hepathlon lead

articles.description: Listen to Sportsound commentary of Kilmarnock v Celtic and follow updates from two more Viaplay Cup last-16 ties, plus the quarter-final draw.
articles.title: Viaplay Cup: Celtic, Hearts & Hibs all in action in last-16

articles.description: Katarina Johnson-Thompson is in gold medal position heading into the heptathlon's final event at the World Athletics Championships.
articles.title: Johnson-Thompson leads heptathlon before final event

articles.description: England goalkeeper Mary Earps saves Jennifer Hermoso's penalty in the Women's World Cup final.
articles.title: 'Could this be the turning point?' Earps makes crucial penalty save

articles.description: England forward Lauren Hemp hits the crossbar as they take on Spain in the final of the 2023 Women's World Cup.
articles.title: 'How close can you get?' - Hemp hits crossbar
